conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and functional sleepwear to enhance my relaxation and sleep quality. within my expected price range: [14.92, 22.77]

I'm interested in the Ashford & Brooks Women's Sleep Pajama Pants you recommended. Could you please provide more details about them to help me decide if they meet my needs for comfortable and functional sleepwear?

The Ashford & Brooks Women's Sleep Pajama Pants (B07TN2DF5F) priced at $20.99 are designed to provide both style and comfort, perfect for enhancing relaxation and sleep quality. Made from a luxurious, shrink-resistant 60% cotton/40% polyester blend, these pajama pants offer a roomy fit, fashionable contrast drawstring ribbon, and roomy pockets to hold essentials. They are available in various chic designs and sizes. If you decide to purchase these pajama pants, I'd also like to introduce the potentially purchasable candidate: Ekouaer Pajamas Women's Long Sleeve Sleepwear Set (B0BB6K73FC) priced at $45.99, which features a two-piece pajama set with a long sleeve top and pants for a relaxed fit, made from ultra-soft and cozy materials.
